episodes.title: Faladev #30 | The Importance of Contribution in Open Source
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, João Pedro, Diego Haz e Bruno Lemos
episodes.description:
In this episode of Faladev, Diego Fernandes meets João Pedro Schmitz, Bruno Lemos and Diego Haz, to discuss the importance of open source contributions and what challenges are circulating in the community.

We'll move on to most of the time writing code. Now is the time to talk about it. Every week we bring tech professionals together to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Diego and Dani received Laura Beatris and Rafael Camarda at Faladev's table to talk about functional programming and object-oriented programming.

episodes.title: Faladev #28 | Behind barriers and solutions proposed by microservices
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Dani Leão, Wesley Williams e Lucas Santos
episodes.description:
Developers Wesley Willians and Lucas Santos were invited to this Faladev to have a conversation about what micro-services are and what are the challenges and barriers of their application.

In this issue, Diego Fernandes and Daniele Evangelista guide the conversation by raising relevant topics and questions about the subject.

episodes.title: Faladev #26 | Special: exclusive interview with José Valim, creator of the Elixir language
episodes.description:
In this final season special edition we had the opportunity to have a conversation with José Valim, the Brazilian dev who created the programming language Elixir — used internationally in several technologies, including Discord and Pinterest.

O The topic of the week revolved around several processes involved in the creation of a new language, which proposes to be an efficient alternative in the technology market.

Besides all that, Valim was able to talk about a lot of code and about his journey and experience in creating an active community behind open source.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now is the time to talk about it. Every week, we bring together three tech professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about many topics that matter to your dev career.

episodes.title: Faladev #25 | What is UX/UI?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Tiago Luchtenberg e Thainan Librelon
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now is the time to talk about it. Every week, we bring together three tech professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about many subjects that matter to your dev career.

p>In this episode, Diego Fernandes meets Thainan Librelon and Tiago Luchtenberg to discuss: Developer can do UI/UX work, what impact? What is the ideal time to have people specializing in UX and UI? And after all, what is UI and what is UX?

episodes.title: FalaDev #23 | What do communities have to do with technology?
episodes.members: Diego Fernandes, Isabela Castilho e João Inácio
episodes.description:
We spend most of our time writing code. Now is the time to talk about it. Every week, we bring together three tech professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

Faladev is an original Rocketseat podcast where we talk about many subjects that matter to your dev career.

p>In this first episode of the new season, Diego Fernandes meets Isabela Castilho and João Inácio Neto (Biro) to discuss communities and the impact they have on the career of devs in search of the next level. After all, what is a community and what does it have to do with technology?
